definition: see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Nunchaku is perhaps one of the most well recognized weapons in2)martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 双节棍可能是武术中最为人所熟知的武器。

sentences.english: When training with the nunchaku at first, be prepared to look like a bad comedy routine.
sentences.chinese: 开始学习双节棍时，要有出洋相的心理准备。

sentences.english: Instructors were trained and big tournaments were organized.
sentences.chinese: 各地培训双节棍教练员，组织武术大赛，如火如荼。

sentences.english: Michaelangelo is the master of the whirling nunchakus.
sentences.chinese: 米开朗基罗是耍双节棍的高手。

sentences.english: Chinese nunchaku tend to be rounded, whereas Japanese are octagonal .
sentences.chinese: 中国的双节棍多是圆的，而日本的是八边形的。

sentences.english: The traditional nunchaku is made from a strong, flexible hardwood such as oak, or loquat.
sentences.chinese: 传统的双节棍是由坚韧的硬木，如橡木或枇杷制成的。

sentences.english: Using nunchakus can be dangerous if you don't use them properly.
sentences.chinese: 双节棍使用不当，是会很危险的。

definition: variant of 雙節棍|双节棍[shuang1 jie2 gun4]
nunchaku (weapon with two rods joined by a short chain, used in martial arts)
Changquan - Northern Shaolin (北少林) - Longfist - Martial Art
Jeet Kun Do or Way of the Intercepting Fist, a fusion of Eastern and Western martial arts led by Bruce Lee 李小龍|李小龙[Li3 Xiao3 long2]
Ba Ji Quan "Eight Extremes Fist" - Martial Art

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Wing Chun/same as 詠春拳|咏春拳[yong3 chun1 quan2]/Yongchun - "Singing Spring Fist" (Chinese martial art)
a kind of traditional Chinese sword-play
